items.sentence: It\'s not the first time Tom has done something like that.
It\'s too early to tell if Tom will be able to walk again.
I gathered together my things and put them in my suitcase.
I give you enough money every month to pay all your bills.
I had no idea there were so many people in the other room.
I thought Tom could handle the job if I gave him a chance.
I thought that you were going to talk about this with Tom.
I told you it would be a waste of time asking Tom to help.
Tom slept under the tree, using his knapsack for a pillow.
It\'s difficult to help people that don\'t want your help.
